title: Compare House and Senate Rules and Roles

content.question: Which of the following is an accurate comparison of the United States House of Representatives and the United States Senate?

choices.label: House of Representatives Senate represents the states equally Designed to represent the people
House of Representatives Senate Initiates revenue bills Nominates cabinet members
House of Representatives Senate Must approve Supreme Court nominees Must approve treaties
House of Representatives Senate Debate on bills is limited Debate on bills can be unlimited

content.answer: House of Representatives Senate Debate on bills is limited Debate on bills can be unlimited

topic.text: 2.1: Congress: The Senate and the House of Representatives

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
